First off I am so incredibly sorry this happened to you. If you are in the US report her to the board so they can evaluate her license. He might do dumb stuff but he is there for you everyday and he loves you. I have to do this every day. My depression wants to make everyone a villian. It is really hard somedays. Keep pushing. Let him in. Itâ€™s ok. We are here for you.
